title: Setup Sequelize Model
description: Finalize the Task model definition, including all necessary attributes and associations.

title: Configure Database Connection
description: Establish a stable connection to the PostgreSQL/MySQL database using the provided credentials in 'config/db.ts'.

title: Implement API Route for Tasks
description: Create GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE endpoints for managing tasks (CRUD operations).

title: Write Unit Tests for Model
description: Develop comprehensive unit tests to ensure the Task model behaves as expected.

title: Design Front-End Task List
description: Create the initial HTML/React component structure for displaying the list of tasks.

title: Debug Task Creation Bug
description: Investigate and resolve the issue where new tasks are being saved without a 'title'.

title: Review PR #42: Database Seeding
description: Check the pull request that adds the initial data seeding script for the Task model.

title: Update Documentation
description: Document the new Task model and its API endpoints in the project README.

title: Refactor Task Controller Logic
description: Clean up the code in the Task controller to improve readability and performance.

title: Plan Next Sprint Features
description: Meet with the team to define tasks for the upcoming development sprint.

title: Optimize Database Queries
description: Analyze slow queries and add indexes or optimizations to improve performance.

title: Implement User Authentication
description: Add JWT-based authentication for all API routes and secure endpoints.

title: Create Landing Page UI
description: Design and implement the public landing page using React and Tailwind CSS.

title: Perform Cross-Browser Testing
description: Ensure the application works correctly on Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.

title: Integrate Email Notifications
description: Send email alerts to users when tasks are assigned, updated, or completed.

title: Set Up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Configure GitHub Actions for automatic testing and deployment on merge to main branch.

title: Implement Dark Mode
description: Add theme toggling functionality for light and dark mode in the frontend app.

title: Create Analytics Dashboard
description: Build a dashboard to show task completion stats, user activity, and performance metrics.

title: Conduct Code Review Session
description: Review team submissions and provide feedback for improvements and best practices.
